screen_desc: The screenshot shows the Amazon product page for a pair of Razer headphones. The original list price is struck through at $149.99, with the current price shown as $118.29, indicating a savings of $31.70 (21%). There is an option to buy new, with details mentioning "No Import Fees Deposit & $17.83 Shipping to Netherlands." Below that is a delivery estimate for Friday, November 4, indicating the item is in stock. There is a button for adding the item to the cart and an option to select the quantity before purchasing.
